lead_paragraph: DICKLER--Ruth. The officers and staff of The Pollock-Krasner Foundation mourn the passing of Ruth Dickler, beloved wife and widow of Gerald Dickler, the Founder Chairman of The Pollock-Krasner Foundation. For over thirty years, Ruth gave advice and counsel to the Foundation's program. We will miss her wisdom, grace and generosity. We extend our deepest sympathy to her family. Charles Bergman, Chairman Samuel Sachs II, President Kerrie Buitrago, Executive Vice President 1/3
